metadata.feature_description: Navigation controls for paginated data in tag statistics and popular content

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics panel opens with dashboard showing tag statistics and popular content sections with pagination controls
steps.actual: Community Analytics menu item exists and is clickable, but the module fails to load due to JavaScript error: 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' at dashboardClass.init in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js

steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard displays with trending tags, popular content, and pagination controls
steps.actual: Module initialization fails completely. Content panel remains blank. Console shows error in social-dashboard-combined-instance.js at line 1025 where utility.serializeCustomDate is called but utility object does not have this function defined.

issues: CRITICAL BUG: Community Analytics module fails to initialize due to missing utility.serializeCustomDate function
Root cause: The utility object passed to the init function does not contain the serializeCustomDate method, indicating a dependency or initialization order issue
Impact: Entire Community Analytics module is inaccessible, preventing all testing of pagination controls and other features

steps.action: Attempted to access pagination controls in tag statistics or popular content sections
steps.expected: Pagination controls visible with prev/next arrows to navigate between pages of data
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error preventing access to any UI elements

issues: Test cannot be performed due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test with single page of data

steps.action: Attempted to verify pagination behavior with limited data
steps.expected: Pagination controls hidden or disabled when data fits on single page
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be performed due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

steps.action: Attempted to verify current page indicator display
steps.expected: Current page number displayed correctly in pagination controls
steps.actual: Unable to test - Community Analytics module fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: Test cannot be performed due to Community Analytics module initialization failure

observations: Code review confirms pagination controls exist in the codebase: pageActivities.js contains prev/next pager UI component with pagerVisible, pagerPrevClass, pagerNextClass bindings
Backend pagination is implemented in CommunityAnalyticsController.cs with pageIndex and pageSize parameters for GetTagStats, GetPopularContent, GetModuleTagStats, GetModulePopularContent endpoints
Pager initialization found in social-dashboard-instance.js: pager.init(popularContentViewModel, 5, getPopularContent) and pager.init(tagStatsViewModel, 6, getTagStats)
Page size is hardcoded: 5 items for popular content, 6 items for tag statistics - no UI option to change page size
Jump to specific page functionality does not appear to exist - only simple prev/next navigation
CRITICAL: Community Analytics module has a JavaScript initialization bug that prevents the entire module from loading, making all UI testing impossible
The bug is in the dependency injection - utility.serializeCustomDate is expected but not provided to the dashboardClass.init function
